channel.title: Internship?
channel.description: Well, This guy offered me an internship.. Took a quiz and all that. Failed it, but I knew more than he though I would. He got me a job at his wifes place... and I have to go talk to him tomorrow.. Someone told me internships are scams, like they use you for free labor and cycle through.. Its for like computer repair, but they do more than that. Like there doing some satelite gps for ambulances or some shit. Just wanna see if this is a good idea or not. Oh am I gonna get drug tested? Not really a major franchise.. Didn't sign anything... :/

item.title: Internship?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I’m always offering free web design/programming to small companies/groups and they always reject me because I have barely anything to show my experience. So even if you don’t get paid and don’t actually learn anything, at least it’s something you can say you’ve done.

Read full topic

item.title: Internship?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

SETO:

even if you get paid $0, if it gives you experience take it.

I would suggest this. But if it’s paid, how can it possibly be a scam?

Read full topic

internships give you experience, trying to get a job after getting qualifications without experience is pretty hard

item.title: Internship?
item.dc:creator: @Starting_up Starting up ...
item.description:
@Starting_up wrote:

Well, This guy offered me an internship… Took a quiz and all that. Failed it, but I knew more than he though I would. He got me a job at his wifes place… and I have to go talk to him tomorrow… Someone told me internships are scams, like they use you for free labor and cycle through… Its for like computer repair, but they do more than that. Like there doing some satelite gps for ambulances or some shit. Just wanna see if this is a good idea or not. Oh am I gonna get drug tested? Not really a major franchise… Didn’t sign anything…

Read full topic
